遀字的基本解释

遀
suí
古同“随”。

遀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suí］
同“隨1”。
作人名用字。宋有赵与遀。见《宋史·宗室世系表四》。

遀字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遀； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1260第24
【集韻】隨古作遀。【正字通】俗隋字。古文作䢫。隋煬帝惡前代屢遷，因去之作隋。獨集韻謂隨古作遀，臆說，不可從。

遀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
遀字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［suí］

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of the Characters of Zou] 　遀; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1260 Page 24
【Ji Yun】Follow the ancient works. [Zhengzitong] Vulgar Sui characters. The ancient text is composed. Emperor Yang of the Sui Dynasty moved repeatedly from the previous generations, because he left for the Sui Dynasty. The rhyme of the independent collection is said to follow the ancient writings, and it is assumed that it is not to be followed.
